ModMetaData.name: Research Prerequisites 前置研究
ModMetaData.author: RunningBugs
ModMetaData.description:
前置研究模组，简单的给原生科研页面增加了自动研究前置科技的功能，在选择一项研究后，它的所有前置未完成科技会自动进入研究队列并一项项研究。条件：选中的研究需要有研究台，需要有科研蓝图，不能是已完成或者正在研究的科技。特性：当有研究队列时，如果选择了另一项科技，并加入研究队列，会丢弃之前的研究队列；当有研究队列时，如果选择的科技是可以直接研究，并点击了原生的研究按钮，那么在这项科技研究完成后会自动继续之前的研究队列。
Research Prerequisites is a simple mod that adds the ability to automatically research all prerequisites of a selected research. When you select a research, all of its prerequisites that are not yet researched will be automatically added to the research queue and researched one by one. Conditions: the selected research must have a research bench, must have blueprints, and must not be already researched or currently being researched. Features: when there is a research queue, if you select another research and click on the button "add it to the research queue", the previous research queue will be discarded; when there is a research queue, if the selected research can be researched directly and you clicked the vanilla research button, then after the research is completed, the previous research queue will be automatically continued.
